description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Sausage Hotpot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Spicy Sausage Hotpot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 800 g cans Italian cherry tomatoes in tomato sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, combine breadcrumbs, cheeses and parsley in a bowl. Stir in melted butter. Sprinkle breadcrumb mixture over bake and return to oven for 15 minutes or until topping is golden and crisp. Scatter with extra parsley and serve immediately.
